tool.name: OGS: scaleProperty
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'scaleProperty'.
tool.command: scaleProperty #if str($property_name): --property-name '$property_name' #end if #for $f in $mesh: --mesh '$f' #end for --input-unit '$input_unit' --out-mesh output_1.vtu

param.name: property_name
param.label: property name
param.help: the name of the property the values are stored for

param.name: mesh
param.label: mesh
param.help: the input mesh is read from this file,

tool.help: This tool runs the **scaleProperty** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
